pr_title: JIRA: Add support for 'priority' and 'user' fields

timeline.message: Feat(Jira): Add support for 'priority' and 'user' fields
Fix(Jira Cloud): Set 'accountId' field when creating an issue with a user

timeline.bodyText: I don't think it's worth doing right now since this works and we will potentially be rewriting a good chunk of issue-tracking functionality in the coming versions.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: Does adding both here work for Jira Cloud and Jira Server? Or does it error because we provided additional fields?
replies.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: I tested both with this change and it simply ignores the unknown field.
replies.author: gkillough
